actions.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Forbes.
On agreeing to the Forbes amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 256 (Roll no. 476).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert a complete new text consisting of the provisions of H.R. 513, entitled the "New Manhattan Project for Energy Independence".
purpose: An amendment printed in part B of House Report 111-185 to strike everything and insert the text of H.R. 513, the "New Manhattan Project for Energy Independence.".
